    • Method Detail

      • create

        @RequestMapping(value="/create",
                method=POST)
public ClubDto create(@RequestBody
                                                                                    ClubDto club)
                                                                             throws DuplicatedClubAcronymException
        Creates a new Club. Accepts POST method with a ClubDto object.
        Parameters:
        club - ClubDto object with values for new club.
        Returns:
        ClubDto object with the values of the new created Club.
        Throws:
        DuplicatedClubAcronymException - If Acronym for new club is in use by another club.
